_comment: This file is not used, but represents data stored in UI for templates
name: Cloudant Events
description: When a Cloudant DB has a document edited or added, log the change in the console.
long_description: This Template will create a sequence of actions, and a trigger that will kick off that sequence. The trigger is fired when there is a change in the connected Cloudant DB, which should be a database of cats, each with a name and a color defined. When a new cat is added to the database, or a current cat edited, the data will be logged to the console.
